mapper.insert: INSERT INTO record_tb(userId, win, lose, draw) VALUES(#{userId}, 0, 0, 0)
mapper.select: SELECT userId, win, lose, draw, (win+lose+draw) AS total, ROUND (NVL(win/DECODE((win+lose+draw),0,null,(win+lose+draw))*100,0)) as rate FROM record_tb WHERE userId = #{userId}

SELECT userId,win,lose, draw, win+lose+draw as total, RANK () OVER(ORDER BY win desc) as rank FROM (SELECT userId, win,lose, draw, win+lose+draw as total from record_tb order by win desc) where ROWNUM <=10

SELECT userId, win, lose, draw, win+lose+draw as total, RANK () OVER(ORDER BY lose desc) as rank FROM (SELECT userId, win,lose, draw, win+lose+draw as total from record_tb order by lose desc) where ROWNUM <=10

SELECT userId, win, lose, draw, win+lose+draw as total, RANK () OVER(ORDER BY win+lose+draw desc) as rank FROM (SELECT userId, win, lose, draw, win+lose+draw as total from record_tb order by win+lose+draw desc) where ROWNUM <=10

SELECT userId, win, lose, draw, win+lose+draw as total, ROUND (NVL(win/DECODE((win+lose+draw)*100,0,null,(win+lose+draw))*100 ,0))as rate, RANK () OVER(ORDER BY ROUND (NVL(win/DECODE((win+lose+draw)*100,0,null,(win+lose+draw))*100 ,0))desc) as rank FROM (SELECT userId, win, lose, draw, win+lose+draw as total, ROUND (NVL(win/DECODE((win+lose+draw)*100,0,null,(win+lose+draw))*100 ,0))as rate from record_tb order by ROUND (NVL(win/DECODE((win+lose+draw)*100,0,null,(win+lose+draw))*100 ,0))) where ROWNUM <=10
